description: Major milestones in artificial intelligence, from early ideas to modern breakthroughs.

events.title: Alan Turing publishes 'Computing Machinery and Intelligence'
events.summary: Introduced the concept of the Turing Test to evaluate machine intelligence.

events.title: Dartmouth Conference
events.summary: The workshop where the term 'Artificial Intelligence' was coined.

events.title: Deep Blue defeats Garry Kasparov
events.summary: IBM’s chess-playing system beats the reigning world champion.

events.title: AlphaGo beats Lee Sedol
events.summary: DeepMind’s AlphaGo defeated the world champion in Go, a historic AI milestone.
